comment:
* {@code RuntimeException} is the superclass of those * exceptions that can be thrown during the normal operation of the * Java Virtual Machine. * *

{@code RuntimeException} and its subclasses are unchecked * exceptions. Unchecked exceptions do not need to be * declared in a method or constructor's {@code throws} clause if they * can be thrown by the execution of the method or constructor and * propagate outside the method or constructor boundary. * * @author Frank Yellin * @jls 11.2 Compile-Time Checking of Exceptions * @since 1.0
